alert.note: Alert for Ben Hill; Irwin; Turner (Georgia) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Severe Thunderstorm Warning issued September 07 at 8:58PM EDT until September 07 at 9:45PM EDT by NWS Tallahassee
info.description: The National Weather Service in Tallahassee has issued a * Severe Thunderstorm Warning for... Northern Irwin County in south central Georgia... Northeastern Turner County in south central Georgia... Ben Hill County in south central Georgia... * Until 945 PM EDT. * At 857 PM EDT, severe thunderstorms were located along a line extending from near Eastman to 6 miles northwest of Abbeville to near Arabi, moving south at 10 mph. HAZARD...60 mph wind gusts and penny size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Expect damage to roofs, siding, and trees. * Locations impacted include... Fitzgerald, Ashburn, Ocilla, Mystic, Worth, Sycamore, Rebecca, Lulaville, Amboy, Osierfield, Sibley, Ashton, Irwinville, Fitzgerald Municipal A/P, Turner Co Airport, Irwinville Airport, Bowens Mill, Dakota, Red Bluff, and Arp. HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...0.75 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building. Large hail, damaging wind, and continuous cloud to ground lightning are occurring with these storms. Move indoors immediately. Lightning is one of nature`s leading killers. Remember, if you can hear thunder, you are close enough to be struck by lightning. Torrential rainfall is occurring with these storms, and may lead to flash flooding. Do not drive your vehicle through flooded roadways.
